overview: Back on the North Shore for another season... The winter of 1980/81. Hawaiians, Aussies, international all stars, and the new wave of Californians are taking it to the next level.  Weaver and Wills are on the scene, this time with a Super 8 Sound rig to document the surfing world's proving grounds. See and hear what it was like to be there.  Digitally remastered featuring an original musical score by Mphase.
tagline: ... the height of single fin surfing.
title: Stylemasters 2
